desc: Fresh foods and other essentials delivered straight to your door

layout.text:
We are a west London based restaurant serving delicious Taiwanese street food. Our restaurant doors may have closed, but our spirit in helping others is carrying on. We have utilised our restaurant supplier lines and teamed up with partners in the community to create essential food boxes, delivered straight to your doors.
We look forward to continuing serving our customers, and supporting our community through this challenging time.
